title: Nidome no Jinsei wa Zettai, Shiawase ni! ~Murabito ni Tensei shitan dakedo, Kondo wa Hitonami no Shiawase ga Hoshii! Demo, Dekiru no?~ - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Magic   Monsters   Sword And Magic
author: Yuubakumin.   ちょいぶるちゃん   遊爆民。
description:
In a world of powerful magics, the Demon Lord that instilled bottomless fear was confronted by the Heroes.

	The Hero, together with three comrades, fought together fiercely and finally defeated the Demon Lord.

	Then, the Hero married the beautiful holy sage and lived in everlasting happiness, escorting in peaceful times…

	※

	Similar to that fairy-tail, a girl named Estella dreamt of a sweet chance, dream-like encounter, like coffee with condensed milk and lots of sugar added (lots of milk).

	That girl is just common folk, an average citizen that tends to dream.

	However, Estella had a secret that she wouldn’t tell anyone.

	「Ain’t this useless! I was tricked!」

	That was, that she reincarnated as a villager, while retaining her past memories.

	In addition, she spewed indecent words as her only memories were as an insignificant villager.

	Today as well, only Estella’s characteristic brightness helped her struggle through her troubles, but…

	Reincarnating into this new villager, with a new start, would she be able to achieve happiness… perhaps?

	「What will my future plans become?!」

	Speaking of which, what if villagers are the strongest? (Not possible, though)>
